abstract: The decision to hire Brendan V. Sullivan Jr. comes as the News Corporation’s escalating legal crisis in the British phone-hacking scandal spills over into the United States.
snippet: The decision to hire Brendan V. Sullivan Jr. comes as the News Corporation’s escalating legal crisis in the British phone-hacking scandal spills over into the United States.

headline.main: News Corp. Hires Top Criminal Defense Lawyer
